purpleculture_pinyin:
yàn
to examine; to test; to check
изучить; тестировать; Проверять
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 验)
Pictophonetic: 僉 indicates the sound; 馬 (horse) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 馬 [ mǎ ] horse; surname
    • 僉 [ qiān ] all, together, unanimous
heisig_chinese_memo: Horses don't seem that smart but at night they have debates in the stable.  You should check! Then again, you probably won't hear anything because they'll be checking for you too!
Ru_trainchinese:
yàn: (графема) производить желаемый эффект; желаемый эффект
yàn: (глаг) испытывать, проверять
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: This horse makes his checks be doing little shows at hootenannies instead of by racing.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " horse ", "佥", used as the name of the horse, often means verification. "Shuowen": "The name of the horse. From the horse to the sound." "Han Feizi·Nan Mian": "Those who have no reason to argue, and those who have nothing to prove, are responsible for this."

" Experience " can mean evidence. "Historical Records-The Biography of Shang Jun": "The law of Shang Jun, whoever has no experience in giving up others sits."

" Inspection " can also mean inspection. "Songs of the Chu-Nine Chapters-Cherish the Past": "Father's test is to test the truth, and Fuchs will be moved away from the minister." Wang Yi's note: "Do not examine the poor and check the original."

" Experience " can also indicate effect. "Huainanzi‧ Master Skill Training": "The way is easy but the difficult is sought, and the test is near but the far is sought. Therefore, it is also worthless." Gao Yin's note: "Proving is also effective."

" Experience " also means a sign. "Lunheng‧ Daoxu": "Huang is familiar with things, and white is old and effective."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " horse " and "佥", it is used as the name of a horse, and it often means verification.
humanum_full_description:
從「馬」，「僉」聲，用作馬名，常表示驗證。《說文》：「馬名。从馬，僉聲。」《韓非子‧南面》：「言無端末，辯無所驗者，此言之責也。」

　　「驗」可表示證據。《史記‧商君列傳》：「商君之法，舍人無驗者坐之。」

　　「驗」也可表示檢查。《楚辭‧九章‧惜往日》：「弗參驗以考實兮，遠遷臣而弗思。」王逸注：「不審窮覈其端原也。」

　　「驗」還可表示效果。《淮南子‧主術訓》：「道在易而求之難，驗在近而求之遠，故弗得也。」高誘注：「驗，效也。」

　　「驗」亦表示徵兆。《論衡‧道虛》：「黃為物熟驗，白為人老效。」
humanum_short_description: 從「馬」，「僉」聲，用作馬名，常表示驗證。

①檢查，察看：驗覈。驗血。驗屍。驗光。驗證。
②效果，有效果：驗方。靈驗。應驗。效驗。屢試屢驗。
③證信，憑據：何以爲驗？
(Simplified: 验)

Pictophonetic: 僉 indicates the sound; 馬 (horse) conveys the meaning.

Chinese: Horses don't seem that smart but at night they have debates in the stable. You should check! Then again, you probably won't hear anything because they'll be checking for you too!

從「 馬 」，「 僉 」聲，用作馬名，常表示驗證。《說文》：「馬名。从馬，僉聲。」《韓非子‧南面》：「言無端末，辯無所驗者，此言之責也。」 「 驗 」可表示證據。《史記‧商君列傳》：「商君之法，舍人無驗者坐之。」 「 驗 」也可表示檢查。《楚辭‧九章‧惜往日》：「弗參驗以考實兮，遠遷臣而弗思。」王逸注：「不審窮覈其端原也。」 「 驗 」還可表示效果。《淮南子‧主術訓》：「道在易而求之難，驗在近而求之遠，故弗得也。」高誘注：「驗，效也。」 「 驗 」亦表示徵兆。《論衡‧道虛》：「黃為物熟驗，白為人老效。」
From the sound of " horse", " 佥", used as the name of the horse, often means verification. "Shuowen": "The name of the horse. From the horse to the sound." "Han Feizi·Nan Mian": "Those who have no reason to argue, and those who have nothing to prove, are responsible for this." " Experience" can mean evidence. "Historical Records-The Biography of Shang Jun": "The law of Shang Jun, whoever has no experience in giving up others sits." " Inspection" can also mean inspection. "Songs of the Chu-Nine Chapters-Cherish the Past": "Father's test is to test the truth, and Fuchs will be moved away from the minister." Wang Yi's note: "Do not examine the poor and check the original." " Experience" can also indicate effect. "Huainanzi‧ Master Skill Training": "The way is easy but the difficult is sought, and the test is near but the far is sought. Therefore, it is also worthless." Gao Yin's note: "Proving is also effective." " Experience" also means a sign. "Lunheng‧ Daoxu": "Huang is familiar with things, and white is old and effective."

驗字的基本解释

驗
yàn
见“验”。

驗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yàn］
［《廣韻》魚窆切，去豔，疑。］
“验1”的繁体字。亦作“騐1”。
(1)验证；证实。
(2)凭证；证据。
(3)检验；考查。
(4)效验；效果。
(5)指有功效；灵验。
(6)征兆；征象。

驗字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　驗； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页1445第40
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?魚窆切，黏去聲。【玉篇】馬名也。　又證也，效也。【史記·晉世家】獻公曰：何以爲驗。荀息對曰：使死者復生，生者不慙，爲之驗。　又考視也。【前漢·楊惲傳】惲下廷尉，于定國考問，左驗明白。【註】左，證左也。言當時在其左右見此事者也。又【前漢·平帝詔】其當驗者，卽驗問。【註】就其所居而問。　俗作騐驗，非。

驗字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
驗字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yàn］
["Guangyun" fish cut, go Yan, suspicious. ]
Traditional characters of "验1". Also called "Examination 1".
(1) Verification; confirmation.
(2) Credentials; evidence.
(3) Inspection; examination.
(4) Validity; effect.
(5) Refers to effective; effective.
(6) Signs; signs.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji Chapter 1】【Horse Character Department】　Experience; Kangxi strokes: 23;
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? The fish is sliced, and the sound is glued. [Jade articles] The name of the horse.　Providence and effectiveness. 【Historical Records·Jin Family】Xiangong said: How can it be verified. Xun Xi said: to bring the dead back to life, and the living will not be afflicted, for it to be tested.　Take a look at it again. [Previous Han·Yang Yun Biography] Yu Xia Tingwei, Yu Dingguo asked, Zuo Yan understood. [Note] Left, Zheng Zuo also. It was said that those who saw the matter in his right and left at that time also. Also [Previous Han·Ping Di Zhao] The person who was approved, 卽 asked. [Note] Ask about where he lives.　Usually made a test, no.
